title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.901 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.901 - Scope

State Regulations

Sections
255.901
through
255.951
of this Part prescribe
minimum requirements for an integrity management program on any gas
transmission pipeline covered under this Part. For gas transmission pipelines
constructed of plastic, only the requirements in sections
255.917, 255.921, 255.935 and
255.937
of this Part
apply. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.901

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
